Avatar.name: children
Avatar.description: The badge at the bottom right corner of the avatar.

Avatar.name: name
Avatar.description: The name of the person in the avatar.

Avatar.name: showBorder
Avatar.description: If `true`, the `Avatar` will show a border around it.

Badge.name: colorScheme
Badge.description: The color scheme of the badge

Button.name: iconSpacing
Button.description:
The space between the button icon and label.
Use the styled-system tokens or add custom values as a string

Button.name: isActive
Button.description: If `true`, the button will be styled in it's active state.

Button.name: isDisabled
Button.description: If `true`, the button will be disabled.

Button.name: isFullWidth
Button.description: If `true`, the button will take up the full width of its container.

Button.name: isLoading
Button.description: If `true`, the button will show a spinner.

Button.name: leftIcon
Button.description:
If added, the button will show an icon before the button's label.
Use the icon key in `theme.iconPath`

Button.name: loadingText
Button.description:
The label to show in the button when `isLoading` is true
If no text is passed, it only shows the spinner

Button.name: rightIcon
Button.description:
If added, the button will show an icon after the button's label.
Use the icon key in `theme.iconPath`

Button.name: type
Button.description: The html button type to use.

Button.name: variant
Button.description: The variant of the button style to use.

Button.name: colorScheme
Button.description: The color scheme of the button.

Checkbox.name: children
Checkbox.description: The children is the label to be displayed to the right of the checkbox.

Checkbox.name: defaultIsChecked
Checkbox.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be initially checked.

Checkbox.name: isChecked
Checkbox.description:
If `true`, the checkbox will be checked.
You'll need to pass `onChange` to update it's value (since it's now controlled)

Checkbox.name: isDisabled
Checkbox.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be disabled

Checkbox.name: isFullWidth
Checkbox.description: If `true`, the checkbox should take up the full width of the parent.

Checkbox.name: isIndeterminate
Checkbox.description:
If `true`, the checkbox will be indeterminate.
This only affects the icon shown inside checkbox
and does not modify the isChecked property.

Checkbox.name: isInvalid
Checkbox.description:
If `true`, the checkbox is marked as invalid.
Changes style of unchecked state.

Checkbox.name: isReadOnly
Checkbox.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be readonly

Checkbox.name: name
Checkbox.description:
The name of the input field in a checkbox
(Useful for form submission).

Checkbox.name: onChange
Checkbox.description: The callback invoked when the checked state of the `Checkbox` changes..

Checkbox.name: size
Checkbox.description: The size (width and height) of the checkbox

Checkbox.name: value
Checkbox.description:
The value to be used in the checkbox input.
This is the value that will be returned on form submission.

Checkbox.name: colorScheme
Checkbox.description: The color scheme of the checkbox.

Icon.name: focusable
Icon.description:
If `false`, it means the icon is used within interactive
element and won't be focuable.

Icon.name: role
Icon.description: The role of the icon. `presentation` or `img`

Image.name: alt
Image.description: The alt text that describes the image

Image.name: fallbackSrc
Image.description:
In event there was an error loading the `src`, specify a fallback
In most cases, this can be an avatar or image placeholder

Image.name: htmlHeight
Image.description: The native HTML `height` attribute to the passed to the `img`

Image.name: htmlWidth
Image.description: The native HTML `width` attribute to the passed to the `img`

Image.name: ignoreFallback
Image.description: Opt out of the `fallbackSrc` logic and use the `Image` directly

Image.name: onError
Image.description: A callback for when there was an error loading the image `src`

Image.name: onLoad
Image.description: A callback for when the image `src` has been loaded

Image.name: src
Image.description: The path to the image source

Tag.name: colorScheme
Tag.description: The color scheme of the tag.
